attributes.action: Apologies to Survivors and Victims of Institutional Child Abuse in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hundreds of victims that suffered child abuse in Northern Ireland’s Catholic institutions are still awaiting an apology from the government.

Despite a recent  inquiry in Southern Ireland revelling wide spread institutional abuse, both the British Government and the Northern Ireland Assembly are still failing to support the victims.

The British Government has a responsibility to ensure the safe welfare of children in its care. It is unacceptable dismiss this issue a problem for solely the Catholic Church. 

If you support this view please add 
your name to this petition.
